# Hey there!

## I am Prachi, a student at Monash University. 

I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Business Analytics (2021 to 2023), and I have graduated in Engineering of Information Technology from India. I am very much excited to share my thoughts and ideas with you all. I hope you find my blogs interesting and informative.


You can check out my [GitHub](https://github.com/pjai0005) page for more exciting analysis. You can also connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/prachi-jaiswal-a07b66161/).


If you find anything inaccurate with my blog, kindly report over [here](https://github.com/etc5523-2021/blog-pjai0005/issues).
